title: Watch Now Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has navigated to the Home tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the Home Tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a Hero background image relevant to the game or show

AND 

+ Entitled users are able to launch the content and receive playback of a live or archived game

AND/OR

+ Non-game content such as SLive, FLive, VOD, and SVOD streams

title: Today Carousel (0 Games Scheduled)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Home tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating through the Home tab
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Games carousel, when games are scheduled, will be available for the user to interact with

AND

+ The Games carousel will be hidden if no games are scheduled for the day

title: Today Carousel (1 Game Scheduled)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Home tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating through the Home tab

AND

+ There is only one game scheduled for the day
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The Games carousel will be hidden if the only game is located in the Hero

OR

+ The Games carousel will be displayed with the one game scheduled if non-game content is available in the hero

title: Today Carousel (SLive Scheduled)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has navigated to the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Navigating through the Home tab

AND

+ There is an SLIVE stream available

AND

+ The SLIVE is not in the hero space
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to play back the SLIVE content in the "Today" carousel

title: VOD Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating through the Home tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ viewing various free, VOD carousels

Ex: Defensive Highlights
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will not see a lock icon on the video tile

AND

+ The user is able to successfully launch VOD content and receive playback

title: Featured Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating through the Home tab
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Featured carousel
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Entitled users will be able to launch SVOD and SLive content from the Featured carousel

AND

+ Non-entitled users will be able to launch the VOD and FLive content from the featured carousel

title: Home
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user has selected the Home section
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the content available within the Home section of the app
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will see a hero image and featured content at the top

AND

+ A game tile scoreboard carousel if there are games scheduled

AND

# Various SLive, VOD, SVOD, and sometimes FLive content down the app sorted by specified carousels

title: MLBN in Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ A user entitled to MLBN 

AND 

+ MLBN content is published to the hero
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user selects the Watch Live button
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to play back the content

title: MLBN in Today Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user entitled to MLBN 

AND 

+ MLBN content is published to the Today carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user selects the MLBN content
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to play back the content

title: MLBN in VOD/SVOD carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ A user entitled to MLBN 

AND 

+ MLBN content is published to a VOD/SVOD carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user selects the MLBN content
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user is able to play back the content

title: MLBN unentitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ A user not entitled to MLBN content
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user lands on the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ MLBN content is not displayed in the hero or Today on MLB.tv carousel

AND

+ The user cannot launch the content from a Mixed Content Carousel 

AND 

+ The MLBN linear stream will display a lock icon

title: MLBN Content appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is entitled to MLBN content

AND 

+ MLBN content is available and displayed without a lock icon
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Observing the hero or carousel tile for the MLBN stream
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will observe a LIVE badge

AND

+ Duration of the MLBN linear stream will not display duration

title: SLIVE in hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN SLIVE content is published in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SLIVE content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user does NOT have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SLIVE content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN alock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is NOT able to get playback

title: SVOD in hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN SVOD content is published in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SVOD content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user does NOT have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SVOD content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN alock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is NOT able to get playback

title: FLIVE in hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN SLIVE content is published in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has no entitlements and is NOT logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the FLIVE content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has no entitlements and is IS logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the FLIVE content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has any entitlements and is IS logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the FLIVE content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

title: VOD in hero
custom_preconds: GIVEN SLIVE content is published in the hero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has no entitlements and is NOT logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the VOD content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has no entitlements and is IS logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the VOD content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has any entitlements and is IS logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the VOD content from the hero
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

title: SLIVE in Today's carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ SLIVE content is published in the Today on MLB.TV carousel

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SLIVE content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user does NOT have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SLIVE content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is NOT able to get playback

title: SVOD in Today carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ SVOD content is published in the Today on MLB.TV carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ A user does NOT have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement

AND 

+ The user attempts to play back the SVOD content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SVOD content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user does NOT have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user attempts to play back the SVOD content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN alock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is NOT able to get playback

title: FLIVE in Today carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ FLIVE content is published in the Today on MLB.TV carousel

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has no entitlements and is NOT logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the FLIVE content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user has no entitlements and IS logged in
AND the user attempts to play back the FLIVE content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user is logged into an account with entitlements
AND the user attempts to play back the FLIVE content from the Today on MLB.tv carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no lock icon is displayed on the content
AND the user is able to get playback

title: Team Logos - Preview
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is viewing a matchup tile on the Watch or Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN

A game is in a preview state
custom_expected:
THEN

The Away team (Logo, Colors, and Team-code) will be displayed on the left

AND

The Home team (Logo, Colors, Team-code) will be located on the right

AND

"@" will be in the center

title: Team Logos - Live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user is viewing a matchup tile on the Watch or Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN

A game is Live and in-progress
custom_expected:
THEN

The Away team (Logo, Colors, and Team-code) will be displayed on the left

AND

The Home team (Logo, Colors, Team-code) will be located on the right

AND 

The score will be in the center (Ex: 0-0, 5-4)

title: Live Tag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

A feed is available for a game that is in-progres
custom_steps:
WHEN

Viewing the game tile
custom_expected:
THEN

The "Live" tag will be available (Red background, white text)

title: Pitcher & Batter (Live)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is Live
custom_steps:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile on the hero, games carousel, or games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The pitcher's last name will be displayed next to "P"

AND

Under the pitcher will be the current batter's last name displayed next to "AB"

title: Pitcher & Batter (Archive)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is final
custom_steps:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile on the hero, games carousel, or games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The winning pitcher's last name will be located next to "W" under "FINAL"

AND

The losing pitcher's last name will be located next to "L" under the winning pitcher

title: Inning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is in-progress
custom_steps:
WHEN 

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel, or Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The inning will be displayed on the game tile
(Ex: T1 or B2)

title: Preview State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is in the preview state
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile on the Hero, Games Carousel, or Games Page
custom_expected:
THEN

The user will see the start time displayed above the projected starting pitchers

AND

The Bases and Outs icons will be greyed out

title: Runners and Outs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

A game is Live and in-progress
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel, and Games page

AND

There are runners on base or outs in the inning
custom_expected:
THEN

Any runners on base will display on the infield icon in yellow

AND

Any outs recorded will switch the circle icon from grey to white

title: Lock Icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

The user is not-entitled to one or both feeds available in the feed picker
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN 

A lock icon is displayed on the game tile or Hero

AND

The broadcast is disabled and cannot be selected

title: MVPD Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

The user observes a game tile (Ex: ASG)

AND

The game is only available for users with mvpd auth credentials linked to their account
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

The user will see the MVPD Required pill displayed

title: Blackout Pill
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

A logged-in user is in a location where a local team is blacked out

OR

The logged-in user is attempting to view a National game that is blacked out
custom_steps:
WHEN

The user views the game tile from the Hero, Games Carousel and Games page
custom_expected:
THEN

A blackout icon is displayed on the game tile

AND

Tapping on the game tile will display the blackout message

title: Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user has selected the Games section
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the content available to view in the Games section
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Game tiles (Live and Archived) are available to view on days in which games are played

AND

+ A Calendar option is available to select in order to change the date on the Games page

AND

+ If there are no games being played that day, then "No Games Scheduled" copy will be displayed over a background image (Baseball bats for no favorited team)

title: Login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user is not logged into an account

AND

+ The user has selected the Login option
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user views the Sign-In options on this page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be able to sign into their account through the app or by using their Apple Device

OR

+ The user has access to restore their purchase

title: Get MLB.TV
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user is not logged into an account

AND

+ The user has selected the Get MLB.TV option
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates through this MLB upsell section
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be able to create a free account

AND

+ The user has access to browse subscriptions

AND 
+ The user can log into their account

AND

+ The user can elect to explore free content and continue using the app as a free user with no active entitlements

title: Settings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is navigating the top menu

AND

+ The user has selected the Settings option
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user is viewing the options in the list featured in the Settings page
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user can Log In or Log Out
+ The user can change their favorite team
+ The user can enable/disable Hide Spoilers
+ The user can navigate back to Get MLB.TV 
+ The user may restore their MLB.tv purchase
+ The user can view the URLs to the app's TOS
+ The user can view the URL for in-game support

title: Home Page Mixed Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user is signed into an entitled MLB-ALL account
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ The user navigates to a mixed carousel that has features VOD, SLIVE, SVOD, and FLIVE content
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The user can launch and receive playback for each content type in the mixed carousel
